AboutPage.title: About Wathayiq
AboutPage.description: Marafaa is an intelligent and integrated management system designed specifically to meet the needs of lawyers and small law firms in the Arab world. It provides a comprehensive digital solution for organizing cases, tracking sessions, managing tasks, and archiving legal documents, with an easy-to-use interface and a secure environment that protects data privacy.
